sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The length of a colliers sacke, one yard and a halfe Acts & Orders. 1609 City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
W. Jaggard, [London : 1609]
Title taken from first line of text. Printer and publication date from STC. A proclamation relating to the measure of colliers' sacks. At head of page: M.T.C. [i.e. M. Thomas Campbell] 1610. "As Thomas Campbell was Lord Mayor in 1608-9, the proclamation is post-dated.".--STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
